description:
When the fully tattooed yakuza criminal Samejima finds a girl he likes, he kidnaps them, drugs them up, and then roughs them up. Fumino was happy. She had a job and a fiance. But one night, Samejima sets his sights on her, and has his men kidnap her. Fumino manages to escape, and runs to her fiance Satoru`s house, but Samejima is in hot pursuit. Inuyashiki comes to save them, but gets shot.
Source: amazon
